### My Dissertation
Like this digital portfolio, I am building my dissertation, **The Life of Saint Mary the Egyptian: A Digital Critical Edition of the Old French Version T with English Translations**, as a Quarto Book. 

I will defend in the Summer of 2025, and a preview of my dissertation may be found here: [https://leeloren.github.io/dissertation/](https://leeloren.github.io/dissertation/).
